result.eng: He thought he'd faint from the sickness.
result.ga: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneas
result.orig: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneas
result.html: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneasHe thought he'd faint from the sickness.
result.ponchtml: Ċeap sé go dtitfeaḋ sé i laige leis an tinneasHe thought he'd faint from the sickness.
